overview: Alfa, a young singer at the top of his career, is still gentle and faithful to his girlfriend, Laras. But his crazy fans are dominated by young girls, amongst whom is Jane, his most fanatical fan. Jane is obsessed about making Alfa fall for her. As she is the favorite grand daughter of the wealthy Hasan Bakti, who will give her anything she wants, she just might succeed.
title: Dilema Cinta 2 Hati
